abstract: PANEL V: ACCESS TO JUSTICE: Moderator: Lorne Sossin, Dean, Osgoode Hall Law School; Speaker: Janet Mosher, Professor, Osgoode Hall Law School, "Access to Justice Amid Threats of Contagion"; Speaker: Trevor Farrow, Professor, Osgoode Hall Law School, "What is Access to Justice?"; Discussant: Michael Trebilcock, Professor, Faculty of Law, University of Toronto.
title: Panel 5: Access to Justice
subject: law
